settings.subtitle:
Your Gut Matters

Few people actually pay much attention to this, but...

Your gut health is more important than you think.

It operates as the "gateway" of our body: keeping the harmful substances out and letting the life-sustaining nutrients in.

It's also referred to as your "second brain" (or enteric nervous system), that affects mineral absorption, mood, energy, cognitive functions, heart health and immune system.

Basically, the gut is where your body's entire health begins.

And so this is Better Body's primary focus... To champion gut health and elevate the body, mind, and wellness of people around the world!

settings.title: PREVITALIZE
settings.desc:
✔ Increase Effectiveness of the Probiotics in Provitalize (a.k.a. Stronger Weight Loss Effect)
✔ Burn Body Fat and Keep it Off… Forever
✔ Reduce Stress and Improve Stress Management
✔ Improve Mood and Curb Emotional Eating

settings.title: PROVITALIZE
settings.desc:
✔ 6 key fat-fighting ingredients for natural & sustainable weight loss
✔ 3 clinically-proven probiotics to curb your food cravings
✔ Strong anti-inflammation to revive your metabolism
✔ Improves overall immunity, energy & mood.

settings.title: POSTBURN
settings.desc:
✔ Breaking Down Of Fats & Killing Fat Cells
✔ Enhances Mobilization & Utilization of Free Fatty Acids
✔ Reduces Formation & Storage of Fat
✔ Even more energy from the fat that your body burns

settings.title: Your Gut Matters
settings.subtitle:
Few people actually pay much attention to this, but...

Your gut health is more important than you think.

It operates as the "gateway" of our body: keeping the harmful substances out and letting the life-sustaining nutrients in.

It's also referred to as your "second brain" (or enteric nervous system), that affects mineral absorption, mood, energy, cognitive functions, heart health and immune system.

Basically, the gut is where your body's entire health begins.

And so this is Better Body's primary focus... To champion gut health and elevate the body, mind, and wellness of people around the world!

settings.title: FAQ
settings.subtitle: Contact@betterbody.co | +1-702-425-4248

settings.title: Real Customers. Real Results.
settings.content: Every body type is different so results experienced may vary amongst individuals and hence cannot be guaranteed.

settings.title: Who is Better Body Co?
settings.subtitle:
The Better Body Company is a health supplement company who work with health and manufacturing experts to bring you safe and effective solutions based on proven scientific data from clinical studies and market research.

We are constantly improving our products and services based on your feedback, as we keep in touch with customers and help them with their health journey.

settings.title: Why choose our products?
settings.subtitle:
Our products use natural ingredients that have been clinically-proven to help users. Our customers have personally feedbacked to us, experiencing life-changing health benefits such as

• Losing unhealthy, stubborn fats

• Improve gut flora and gut health

• Reduce chronic inflammation

• Reduce food craving

• Feel more energetic

• Improve immunity

settings.title: Are your ingredients natural?
settings.subtitle: All our ingredients are sourced from natural sources.

settings.title: How to consume your supplements? When is the best time to consume?
settings.subtitle:
Take 2 capsules per day with or without food (this applies for Provitalize and Previtalize). Customers have observed the best effects when they take in the morning before food.

If you require more intense and powerful support for your gut, for instance where you have recently completed a round of antibiotics, you can take 3-5 capsules each day.

settings.title: I am on medication. Can I still consume your supplements?
settings.subtitle:
Due to its natural, potent anti-inflammatory effects, Provitalize should not be taken with NSAIDs, blood-thinners and Cox2-inhibitors.

If you are on medication, in pregnancy, or suffer from any medical conditions, please inform your doctor your interest in taking Provitalize or any of our supplements.

settings.title: Is it okay to consume both Provitalize and Previtalize together?
settings.subtitle: Yes. They should be taken together to experience the maximum benefits.

settings.title: What is the difference between Provitalize and Previtalize?
settings.subtitle:
Think of your body as a biological engine, that works like a car engine.

• Provitalize is the key that turns on your engine, unlocking your body’s true fat loss function. This means your weight loss efforts will finally get to show results.

• Previtalize is the fuel for Provitalize and your body. It gives Provitalize the fuel for it to burn your fat with even more power. So your Provitalize can burn even more fats quickly now.

• Postburn is your motor upgrade. It makes your body more efficient in executing its job. You’d generate even more energy from the fat that your body burns, and your body is more ready to work it out than ever.

Taking all of our supplements will scale up your health benefits.

settings.title: How often should I consume the supplements?
settings.subtitle: They should be taken every day, or as instructed by your healthcare professional.

settings.title: Can I take the supplements when I on contraceptive pills?
settings.subtitle: Please inform your doctor your interest in taking Provitalize or any of our supplements.

settings.title: What makes your supplement effective for weight loss?
settings.subtitle:
Most supplements merely treat the symptoms of obesity by attempting to increase energy usage, then users wonder why they are not losing weight.

Our supplements were formulated to target the root cause of stubborn fat and poor health, aiming straight at gut health and chronic inflammation following data from clinical studies.

settings.title: Are your supplements FDA approved?
settings.subtitle:
They are not FDA-approved. Our supplements are manufactured in a GMP-certified (Good Manufacturing Practices) facility in Colorado, US, and they go through a stringent quality check before they are sent out.

Our customers have been posting reviews of their experiences with our supplements, and they have seen positive results such as reduced food craving, feeling more energetic and experiencing a slimmer waist.

settings.title: Do your products have an expiry date?
settings.subtitle: Please check the bottle for the expiry date. The shelf-life of our supplements normally lasts for as long as 2 years.

settings.title: Can I consume your products on empty stomach?
settings.subtitle: Yes, you may either consume on an empty stomach or after meals.

settings.title: I am having some constipation after I consume your supplements. Is this normal?
settings.subtitle: Just like every supplement, it is normal to experience some minor nausea and bloating which is where your body is adjusting. If you experience any serious problems, please stop usage and consult a medical professional.

settings.title: How long can I expect to see results?
settings.subtitle:
Everyone's biology is different so results will vary. We've had customers who see results in as fast as one week while others take slightly more time (around 6-8 weeks) to see results.

The key is to be disciplined in taking 2 capsules every morning without expecting instant results. We recommend going on Autoship to help you take Provitalize consistently.

settings.title: What is Provitalize?
settings.subtitle:
It is a probiotic weight loss supplement that is formulated with natural ingredients clinically-proven to help patients

• Lose unhealthy, stubborn fats
• Improve gut flora and gut health
• Reduce chronic inflammation
• Reduce food craving
• Feel more energetic
• Improve immunity

settings.title: Does Provitalize work?
settings.subtitle:
First, you need to understand the real reason behind why some people are unable to lose weight. This is attributed to chronic inflammation affecting their brain’s metabolic signals, and bad bacteria in the gut triggering excessive hunger in the brain, causing you to gain more fats and triggering you to eat even when you’re full.Provitalize targets the root cause of obesity by reducing brain inflammation and correcting your gut flora.

This improves your body’s metabolism and fat breakdown, while reducing pain that inflammation was causing.

settings.title: What is in Provitalize?
settings.subtitle:
Provitalize contains the following ingredients:

• B. lactis R101-8: 17.2 Billion CFUs
Natural "booster shot" for skyrocketing your body's immunity

• B. breve IDCC4401: 50 Billion CFUs
To increase your metabolism & feel like you're in your 20's again

• L. gasseri SBT2055: 1 Billion CFU
To disrupt fats in your gut & "poop" out unhealthy lipids

• Turmeric root extract: 350 mg
To fight inflammation, increase antioxidant production & reduce the risk of heart disease

• Moringa leaf extract: 350 mg
To manage blood sugar levels, lower cholesterol & support your brain health

• Curry leaf extract: 150 mg
To improve nails, skin health & promote new hair growth & combat greying hair

• Bioperine: 3 mg
To increase overall ingredient absorption & maximize potency & deliverability

• Sunflower lecithin: 50 mg
To increase fat solubility for more effective delivery

• Delayed-release (DR) vegetable cellulose capsule

settings.title: What is Previtalize?
settings.subtitle:
Previtalize is an enhanced prebiotic specially designed to reduce stress, improve mood and emotional well-being, and increase sleep quality; all while accelerating fat loss in the body when taken together with Provitalize.

What makes Previtalize unique and superior is its natural blend of herbs that helps your gut readily absorb nutrients, reducing gas, bloating and stomach upset.

settings.title: Does Previtalize work?
settings.subtitle:
Customers who took Previtalize together with Provitalize have reported experiencing the following results:

• Enhanced weight loss results

• Reduced stress and being able to think clearer in difficult situations

• Better mood and being able to enjoy their time with their family

• Reduced food cravings

• Improved sleep and feeling more energetic after waking up

settings.title: What is in Previtalize?
settings.subtitle:
Previtalize comprises of complex sugars or fibers that pass through the stomach undigested, serving as an energy source selectively for the growth of probiotics of the bifidobacteria & lactobacillus type. These are the 2 types of probiotics comprising Provitalize, which maximizes the benefits you experience.

It contains the following ingredients which also have their own uses:

• Fructooligosaccharides (FOS): 500 mg
The mood enhancer and fat buster

• Inulin (from Jerusalem Artichoke): 350 mg
Serves as a cravings controller, sleep enhancer and fat oxidizer

• Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS): 200 mg
Acts as a stress suppressor and gut booster

• Xylooligosaccharides (XOS): 100 mg
Serves as a strong fat oxidizer

• Burdock Root (Arctium lappa L.): 50 mg
Serves as a health protector

• Vegetable Cellulose Capsule

settings.title: How do I purchase your products? Can I purchase over the phone?
settings.subtitle:
Please visit the product pages to make your purchase:

• Provitalize: https://shop.betterbody.co/pages/pp-provitalize

• Previtalize: https://shop.betterbody.co/products/pp-previtalize-best-natural-herb-enhanced-super-prebiotic-1

• Postburn: https://shop.betterbody.co/products/pp-postburn

We currently do no accept phone orders as the order process requires you to key in your  personal payment information. Our website is secured by encryption, which protects your data while processing your order and is much safer than passing your details through the phone.

settings.title: What is Autoship? How do I get on Autoship?
settings.subtitle:
Autoship is a subscription program where you can have Provitalize delivered to your home every month without having to re-order.

• Less thing on your “to-do” list
Don’t risk forgetting to order Provitalize. Have it shipped to you automatically every month.

• Save big bucks for the long term

You save 25% off the regular price when you are on autoship

• Full control over your orders
You can cancel anytime from your Paypal dashboard.

• Free lifetime shipping & priority fulfillment

• Better results in the long term as you consistently take Provitalize
Many of our customers have reported seeing best results after taking our products consistently over a few months. Common results include slimmer waist, reduced food craving, more energy, improved immunity and a better gut feeling.

Visit our Provitalize Autoship page to save and subscribe now.

settings.title: When will my order be delivered?
settings.subtitle:
Your Provitalize order is on its way from our shipment center in Savannah, Georgia.

Below is the estimated delivery timings so you can manage your excitement.

Expedited Shipping:

• 1 to 4 business days for orders within the US

• 5 to 9 business days for orders outside of the US.

Free Shipping:

• 5 to 12 business days for orders within the US

• 10 to 21 business days for orders outside of the US.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.subtitle: We currently accept Paypal. You can connect your credit/debit card to your Paypal account.

settings.title: What if I do not have a PayPal account to make the purchase?
settings.subtitle: Please contact us via email: contact@betterbody.co and we will provide you an alternative way to purchase where possible.

settings.title: What are the prices in my local currency?
settings.subtitle: Please check with your bank or Paypal on your current local currency conversion rates.

settings.title: How do I know that my order is successful?
settings.subtitle:
You will receive an email receipt and confirmation from us in your email inbox. If you haven't, give it another 15 minutes. Do check your spam folder as well and whitelist contact@betterbody.co so that you can receive our emails.

And in the next 10 minutes or so, you wlll also be receiving a tracking reference number you can use to monitor your order.

settings.title: I am getting an error/having difficulties paying. How can I fix this?
settings.subtitle:
Please contact us via email: contact@betterbody.co

We recommend emailing us as we can usually fix customer’s issues sooner via emails.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping? Do you ship internationally?
settings.subtitle:
Yes, we offer free shipping for orders in the US & Canada.

We ship worldwide. For international orders, there is a shipping cost depending on the weight of the order.

settings.title: Who is Maneuver Marketing Pte Ltd?
settings.subtitle:
Some of our customers were asking who “Maneuver Marketing” was after seeing that charges were directed there.

Not to worry, they are a performance marketing company based in Singapore that we hired to reach out to more people without needing to spend exorbitant amounts on product distribution.

settings.title: How can I cancel my order?
settings.subtitle:
Please note that orders are usually fulfilled within 45 minutes and are shipped within 12 hours as we strive to get our products to our customers as soon as possible.

Order cancellations will not be possible after orders have been shipped. In order to receive a refund for a shipped order, a return must be done. You can track the shipping status of your order with the link provided in the shipping confirmation email.

settings.title: How can I cancel my Autoship Subscription?
settings.subtitle:
It’s simple, transparent, and FULLY controlled by you. All you need to do is:


1. Log in to your Better Body account
2. Select subscriptions
3. Click “Cancel”
4. And you’ll automatically will be taken off Auto-ship (but of course we’ll welcome you back with open arms at the initial special price, should you decide to give Provitalize a long shot)

settings.title: How can I return the bottles?
settings.subtitle:
Please send returns to:
FDC Returns (c/o Better Body Co - Provitalize)
P.O. Box 61553,
Savannah,
GA 31420

Do not send returns to the address on the label. Bottles must not be damaged.

We kindly request you to get a tracking code from the post office and share it with us. This will help us monitor the return status. Once we receive the returned goods, we will immediately process a full refund.

settings.title: Can I get a refund if I’m not satisfied with my results?
settings.subtitle:
Yes, we have a 60-day money-back guarantee from the date of purchase.

Simply return your bottles to us and email us your refund request. We kindly request you to get a tracking code from the post office and share it with us. This will help us monitor the return status. Once we receive the returned goods, we will immediately process a full refund.

settings.title: I still have questions. How do I contact you?
settings.subtitle:
You can contact us via

Email: contact@betterbody.co

Online Contact Form: shop.betterbody.co/pages/contact-us
Email Us: contact@betterbody.co

settings.title: Everyday Probiotics optimised For weight Management & Overall Health
Everyday Probiotics optimised For weight Management & Overall Health
Say Hello To A Better Body
settings.subtitle:
Introducing Provitalize:

Thermogenic Probiotic Formula

settings.title: What's The Difference Between Normal Vs Thermogenic Probiotics?
settings.content: While most probiotics only help digestion & immunity, "thermogenic" probiotics are strains that mimic the fat burning effects of thermogenic supplements (capsicun, green tea, caffeine etc) minus some of the side effects. These unique strains have been studied to impact fat storage, calorie absorption, metabolism & support weight management.

settings.text:
Thermogenic Strain #1: L. Gasseri is commonly found in fermented foods and dairy products like Puba (a Brazilian staple). A study of 210 people showed an average of 8.5% loss of body fat after 12 weeks of consuming L. Gasseri. (1)

Thermogenic Strain #2: B. Breve is largely found naturally in our digestive tract. Additional studies have showed that B. Breve "activates" genes that impact fat metabolism and supports blood sugar levels. (2)

Thermogenic Strain #3: B. Lactis is present in raw milk and is used as starter culture for cheese, cottage cheese and butter milk. This special strains has also been shown to promote better digestion, manage inflammatory responses, cholesterol levels and also acts as an anti-oxidant. (3)

settings.title: Choosing Specific Strains   For A Specific Purpose.

settings.title: What's The Difference Between Normal Vs Thermogenic Probiotics?
settings.content: While most probiotics only help digestion & immunity, "thermogenic" probiotics are strains that mimic the fat burning effects of thermogenic supplements (capsicun, green tea, caffeine etc) minus some of the side effects. These unique strains have been studied to impact fat storage, calorie absorption, metabolism & support weight management.

settings.text:
Thermogenic Strain #1: L. Gasseri is commonly found in fermented foods and dairy products like Puba (a Brazilian staple). A study of 210 people showed an average of 8.5% loss of body fat after 12 weeks of consuming L. Gasseri. (1)

Thermogenic Strain #2: B. Breve is largely found naturally in our digestive tract. Additional studies have showed that B. Breve "activates" genes that impact fat metabolism and supports blood sugar levels. (2)

Thermogenic Strain #3: B. Lactis is present in raw milk and is used as starter culture for cheese, cottage cheese and butter milk. This special strains has also been shown to promote better digestion, manage inflammatory responses, cholesterol levels and also acts as an anti-oxidant. (3)
